Welcome to SkyDy’s documentation!¶

A PDF version of these docs can be found here.

SkyDy is a Python packagel to provide a way to programmatically define an inter-connected mechnical system (ICMS). If you are new to SkyDy, start with some Examples.

This is the central page for all of SkyDy’s documentation.

Contents:

    • Subpackages

      • skydy.connectors package
      • skydy.inertia package
      • skydy.multibody package
      • skydy.output package
      • skydy.rigidbody package
    • Module contents
